headline.main: Encouraging a Healthy Life Style Is Just Good Business

byline.original: By Robert W. Figlerski; Robert W. Figlerski is executive director of the Hofstra Health Dome in Hempstead

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A COOLING economy in Long Island is not the only challenge facing Nassau and Suffolk County employers. The rising cost of health insurance has become a serious drain on revenues and makes it increasingly difficult for companies to grow and compete in a chilly economic climate.
